name: The Turf
description:
The Turf is an electrical robot RTS game. Create your team and protect your buildings from the opposing forces! Buy units for fighting, repairing or even traps. 

SINGLEPLAYER STORY

The game will feature many different levels in places such as cities, forests and suburban areas. You will get to see a range of different teams as you control the turf.

INTERIOR & EXTERIORS

The game features many levels each with it's own buildings. You can go inside every building in the game. Each one has it's own set of strengths such as health, guns or traps!

More Info: http://www.mggames.co.uk/turf.html
